title: How is this fair? Seriously, tell me.
body:
I've been banned for inting on first offence of inting in a norm. 
Bot accounts don't get banned for inting and they don't get banned for using 3rd party programs. 

"it could be a real account" right???

replies.body:
You broke the rules and got banned? Seems pretty fair to me. What difference does it make if it's normal or ranked? Inting is inting.

Bot accounts get banned all the time, it's the ease of creation and volume that makes them prevalent in certain places.
Get cranky about getting rekt mate ðŸ˜‚

> [{quoted}](name=Roguestoney,realm=OCE,application-id=T8eq2lFQ,discussion-id=WsiR4RVt,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2018-03-01T00:50:24.674+0000)
>
> Get cranky about getting rekt mate ðŸ˜‚

you should when you invest time out of your life you won't get back.

I think I saw you in a bot game the other day and you were running down mid repeatedly. 
i ended up not being able to fit in a game because of that. 
or maybe it wasnt you
idk
So explain why I did the same thing and got banned instantaneously? because im human and didnt want to play a game where someone took my role and I used the chat? right?
IT A BOT GAME! WHAT DO YOU WANT. You cant carry bot game? it not like u are vsing 5 other human players and u feeds big different.
Volume? 1 game inting = insta ban. 20+ games inting and third party programs = all g? Yeah bro. I'm sure you know what you're talking about.
You must also remember that bot bans come out in waves. It may take a lil while for accounts like this to get banned but it does happen.

Brown nosing riots ass and trying to come up with a good reason why there's bots in this game is because "it could be a new player". It's clearly fucking not. Stop trying to sugar coat shit about bots being in this game.
